info.title: City Shop Directory API
info.description: API documentation for the City Shop Directory mobile application

post.description: Register a new user account. User type can be 'regular' (default) or 'shop_owner'. Shop owners can create and manage shops.

items.example: The email has already been taken.
The password must be at least 8 characters.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by city name, country, or state

get.summary: Get featured shops for a city
get.description: Returns paginated list of featured shops for a specific city

get.summary: Get latest shops for a city
get.description: Returns paginated list of recently added shops for a specific city

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to look back for latest shops

get.description: Returns aggregated statistics for a city (cached for 1 hour)
Returns active promotional banners for a specific city

description.example: Get up to 50% off on selected items

get.summary: Get services in a city with sorting options
get.description: Returns all user services in a specific city with various sorting and filtering options

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in service title and description

get.description: Get all shops owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new shop. Only users with shop_owner type can create shops.

description.example: A detailed description of the shop

403.description: Forbidden - User is not a shop owner

message.example: Only shop owners can create shops

get.description: Get details of a specific shop owned by the authenticated user

403.description: Unauthorized - Shop does not belong to user

put.description: Update details of a shop owned by the authenticated user

403.description: Unauthorized - Shop does not belong to user

delete.description: Delete a shop owned by the authenticated user

403.description: Unauthorized - Shop does not belong to user

get.summary: Global search across shops, services, and cities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by shop name, description, or address

get.summary: Check if shop is in user's favorites

description.example: Expert plumbing services for homes and offices
Expert plumbing services for homes and offices

tags.name: My Shops
tags.description: Endpoints for managing authenticated user's shops (shop owner only)

tags.name: Search
tags.description: Search endpoints for shops, services, cities
